name: Google Voice Roomy Send Text Message Box
description: Resizes the text boxes in the "Send a text message" modal popup to make things a little more roomy. Allows you to see all five phone numbers at once when texting several people. (I may eventually add a userscript to show contact names instead of just numbers.) Also removes rounded corners on the popup (because the background images used for rounded corners weren't wide enough).
additional_info: Wow. Digging into the Google Voice UI shows how truly outdated it is. Table layouts all over the place, background image replacement for rounded corners, etc. Almost makes me want play with the API and write an updated web client from scratch.
